body_content.explanation: in a way that relates to the present time:
examples: Men dressed in medieval costume shared the stage with contemporarily clothed dancers.
Her aim was to make classical literature contemporarily relevant.

body_content.explanation: in a way that happens at the same time, or among the people who lived at the same period of time:
examples: His letters show that he had little respect for most of the contemporarily popular writers.
Contemporarily, the earl was acclaimed for maintaining peace in the region.
The amount of data that can be handled contemporarily is limited.
